commentBody:
and Elke

O(LA)Y- this was sneaky. After getting the four theme answers, spent considerable time trying to fit " EARS " into HAROLD AND KUMAR, PRAETORIAN GUARD and the FOUNDING FATHERS.. Could have gone until SUN UP.. and thus threw in the towel. UHHUH.
Liked the visual of the ROOMBA close to the HOTROD. We also have TROD.

A bit religion : BIBLE, JOEL , AMEN, LAMA, ABE, OMAR ,ADAM , ST. PETER- all to compensate for the OPEN BARS and KEGS ??
The ICING was we had ELIZA yesterday too.
Learned the motto of the US NAVY--Non sibi, sed patriae.

Hey Leapy- there are two answers for you.
Off to CRASH soon, after looking up BAE.
